item.title: SimpleDSP: IIR Filter Feature Added
item.description: SimpleDSP SimpleDSP is a basic DSP library which is for Arduino and most of the microcontrollers which can be programmed in C/C++ Performance: Here is some examples for its performance. Actually it is not optimized for performance. Its main focuses are portability and education. Arduino Nano FFT 16 points: 2 ms FFT 32 points: 6 ms FFT 64 points: 16 ms fir filter 10 coefficients: 190 us fir filter 23 coefficients: 453 us fir filter 46 coefficients: 900 us 10 coefficients FIR filter can be run at 5khz max frequency on an Arduino Nano.
